content: yarn for this pattern i recommend to use drops snow 100% wool by drops design you can use also another yarn of group e with this weight/length 50g- 50m 55yds for your beanie you need about 100g of the same or different colors hook 9mm needle scissors tape measure this beanie fits an adult the final circumference is 54cm 21 25 in the final height is approx 20cm 7 87 in
